duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of dedicated Global Solution Designers (GSDs) responsible for designing the essential components of ADP's Global Payroll products, solutions, and services for MNC clients.
Set holistic technical design, client expectations, and guide clients through decisions across various countries and solutions being implemented.
Ensure client relationship/expectation management and the Project team's ability to deliver client requirements within project deadlines and budget.
Proactively identify opportunities to improve productivity by recommending changes in tools, training, processes, and procedures.
Drive innovation, best practices, and achievement of strategic objectives.
Optimize resources and staffing in team for efficiency and maximum productivity and utilization.
Improve GSD processes in collaboration with Methodology & Knowledge Mgt, etc. based on understanding of product direction/changes and lessons learned.
Support communications on methodology and business process improvements within the Global Integration Center and to partner teams.
Thrive in a structured environment where you set priorities, organize your day, multi-task, change direction, and provide prompt follow-up.
Execute continuous improvement initiatives across the GSD Team and act as a change leader.
Participate in the definition of the GIC implementation strategy.
Motivate associates through coaching, mentoring, evaluation, and continuous feedback on performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business, Management, or a related field (Master's Preferred)
Workday, Oracle, or SAP Integration Certification (Preferred)
